biotools.summary: Pathway maps, molecular catalogs, genome maps and gene catalogs that capture knowledge about interactions in terms of information pathways. This tool comprises several databases, including BRITE (protein-protein interactions), PATHWAY (interaction networks for cellular processes), and LIGAND (chemical compounds and chemical reactions). Its Atlas is a new tool for the global analysis of metabolic pathways.

bioschemas.name: Kyoto encyclopedia of genes and genomes (KEGG)
